item.title: How to make Raspberry Pi OS Bullseye more useful
item.description: Raspberry Pi OS is great for beginners but after a while you will start to realize that its desktop environment which is a modification of LXDE environment is rather limited to be used as a desktop. To make Raspberry Pi OS into the more standard Debian distro on which it is based on follow the following steps. Either select “Raspberry Pi OS Lite (64-bit)" or “Raspberry Pi OS Lite (32-bit)" and write it on your SD Card or USB Drive.
